General.Name: Nanjing Xinjiekou Department Store Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Xinjiekou Department Store Co., Ltd. operates department stores in China. The company also provides health and elderly care, property rental, and hotel and catering services, as well as develops and sells real estate properties. Nanjing Xinjiekou Department Store Co., Ltd. was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: No. 1, Zhongshan South Road, Nanjing, China, 210005
